UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

UnsecuredDebt.label: Unsecured Debt
UnsecuredDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

ValuationAllowanceAmount.label: Valuation Allowance, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ValuationAllowanceAmount.description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded as of the balance sheet date pertaining to the specified deferred tax asset for which an assessment was made that it is more likely than not that all or a portion of such deferred tax asset will not be realized through related deductions on future tax returns.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Issued, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as other.

ProceedsAndExcessTaxBenefitFromSharebase.label: Proceeds and Excess Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation
ProceedsAndExcessTaxBenefitFromSharebase.description: The aggregate cash inflow comprised of the amount received from (a) employees to acquire the entity's shares under incentive awards, including stock option exercises and restricted stock arrangements, and (b) the excess tax benefit arising from such transactions.

NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfC.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Divestiture, Amount of Consideration Received
NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfC.description: Amount of noncash consideration received for selling an asset or business through a noncash (or part noncash) transaction.

GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Other Assets
GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of other assets.

CashFlowsBetweenTransfereeAndTransferorS.label: Cash Flows Between Transferor and Transferee, Servicing Fees
CashFlowsBetweenTransfereeAndTransferorS.description: Cash Flows between a transferee and a transferor attributable to servicing fees related to a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Mortgage Loans
GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans.description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans made to finance real estate acquisitions. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense, Tax Benefit
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Amount of tax benefit for recognition of expense of award under share-based payment arrangement.
